about.goalText: To build a kind, active, and vibrant community that turns every city into a social playground. And tomorrow, why not become the leading platform for real-life matching across borders?
about.missionText: To rekindle human connections by giving everyone the power to create or join activity groups in just a few clicks ‚Äî based on their interests, passions, and availability.
about.paragraph1: Groopin was born from a simple yet powerful idea: the best connections often start with a well-timed "Shall we go?"
about.paragraph2: Created by a team passionate about real human connection, Groopin is more than just an app ‚Äî it's a new way to meet people in real life through shared activities. At its core, Groopin brings together those who want to experience authentic, spontaneous, and meaningful moments.
about.title: ‚ú® Who Are We?

z1.content: These Terms of Use define the terms of access and use of Groopin, a mobile application that facilitates the connection of people wishing to organize or participate in non-profit group activities. Groopin acts solely as a technical intermediary and is not involved in organizing the proposed activities.
z1.title: Purpose

z10.content: Groopin reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Users will be informed of any changes via notification in the app or by email. Continued use of Groopin implies acceptance of the new conditions.
z10.title: Modifications

z11.content: These Terms are governed by Moroccan law. Any dispute regarding their interpretation or execution falls under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Groopin‚Äôs registered office.
z11.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

z12.content: Groopin enforces a zero-tolerance policy regarding any content, behavior, or activity involving the exploitation, abuse, or endangerment of minors. Any attempt to post, solicit, or exchange content involving minors in an inappropriate manner will result in immediate account termination and may be reported to the appropriate authorities. Users are expected to comply with this rule and report any suspicious behavior immediately via the built-in reporting tool or by email at: contact@groopin.io
z12.title: Protection of Minors and Combating Exploitation

z2.content: By registering or using the application, the user unreservedly accepts all of these Terms. Any user who disagrees with these terms must refrain from using Groopin's services.
z2.title: Acceptance of the Terms

z3.title: Registration Requirements

z4.content:
Users can:
‚Ä¢ Create, publish, search for, and join activities;
‚Ä¢ Only organize unpaid, collaborative activities intended for leisure or social exchange.
Groopin does not intervene in the creation, organization, or supervision of the proposed activities.
z4.title: Service Operation

z5.title: User Obligations

z6.title: Liability

z7.title: Suspension and Termination

z8.title: Personal Data

z9.content: All elements of the application (logos, content, source code, design) are the exclusive property of Groopin‚Äôs publisher. Any unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or use is strictly prohibited and may result in legal proceedings.
z9.title: Intellectual Property

community.note: Here is our usage policy, please follow it to ensure a safe, smooth, and authentic experience for everyone.

section1.point1: Every Groopin member deserves to be treated with respect, no discrimination, no mockery, no pressure.
section1.point2: Harassment, hateful content, sexist, racist, or violent behavior will not be tolerated.
section1.point3: You're always free to decline an activity, leave a group, or not reply, no explanation needed.
section1.title: ü§ù 1. Respect & kindness

section2.point1: You agree to create a real profile with honest information (photo, first name, activity details).
section2.point2: Impersonation, fake identities, or false information are strictly prohibited.
section2.point3: Ratings and reviews must be fair, respectful, and based on real experiences.
section2.title: üßæ 2. Authenticity & transparency

section3.point1: Groopin is not a place for hidden advertising, recruiting, or commercial prospecting.
section3.point2: Activities with purely lucrative, political, or religious purposes are forbidden unless explicitly approved by the Groopin team.
section3.point3: If you're a professional (club, restaurant, coach, etc.), you can become an official partner. Reach out to us, we'd be happy to discuss it.
section3.title: üïäÔ∏è 3. Open, non-commercial activities

section4.point1: Never share another member's personal information without their consent (address, photo, phone number‚Ä¶).
section4.point2: Any activity considered dangerous, illegal, or against Groopin's values will be removed, and accounts may be suspended.
section4.point3: Report any inappropriate behavior or abuse to: contact@groopin.io
section4.title: üîí 4. Safety & privacy

section5.point1: The following are strictly forbidden: spam, bots, fake accounts, data scraping, or any misuse of the platform.
section5.point2: Any attempt to harm the service or break the community's trust will result in immediate account suspension.
section5.title: üö´ 5. Zero cheating, zero spam

section6.closing: You're part of it. And your behavior shapes it. So be curious, respectful, and ready to create real moments. üôå
section6.content: Groopin is more than an app, it's a community. A social, local, human adventure.
section6.title: üíõ 6. Together, we build this community

community.subtitle: The Groopin experience is guided by one golden rule: respect others and yourself.
community.title: Welcome to a community built on respect, trust, and shared moments.

q1.answer: Groopin is a mobile app that allows you to find, create, or join group activities, whether it‚Äôs sports, art, dining, or travel. It offers a wide selection of filters to precisely target the offers you're interested in, along with a built-in messenger to organize your activities easily. The goal: meet new people, share great moments, and break your routine.
q1.question: What is Groopin?

q10.answer: You can write to us at contact@groopin.io
q10.question: Who can I contact in case of a problem?

q2.answer: Yes, the app is free to sign up, create, or join an activity.
q2.question: Is it free?

q3.answer: Anyone aged 18 or older. Whether you're a student, working professional, or simply curious, you are welcome!
q3.question: Who can use Groopin?

q4.answer: You can browse available offers using filters, then click on ‚ÄúJoin‚Äù. The organizer may accept or decline participants based on the type of activity or available spots.
q4.question: How do I join an activity?

q5.answer: From the home screen, tap the ‚ÄúCreate (+)‚Äù button, then add a title, description, date, location, and number of participants. Other fields are available to specify your preferences and better define the group you want to create. This information also acts as filters so users can more easily find matching activities.
q5.question: How do I create an activity?

q6.answer: You can cancel your participation at any time from the offer screen under the ‚ÄúRequests‚Äù section. Please try to notify early out of respect for the organizer.
q6.question: Can I cancel my participation?

q7.answer: Groopin doesn‚Äôt perform systematic verifications. We ensure you're not a bot and encourage every member to complete their profile with a photo, bio, and interests to build trust.
q7.question: Does Groopin verify users?

q8.answer: As with any peer-to-peer meeting, caution is advised. Choose public activities, check profiles, and read reviews. Groops messaging helps you get to know others beforehand and organize smoothly.
q8.question: Is it safe to join activities with strangers?

q9.answer: No. Groopin only connects people. We‚Äôre not present at meetups and can‚Äôt guarantee how they go. Every participant is responsible for their own safety and interactions.
q9.question: Is Groopin responsible for what happens during an activity?
